about_the_game:
Step into the world of rhythm with Drumming Sandbox, the ultimate immersive drumming simulator! Whether you're a seasoned pro or just picking up the sticks for the first time, this game makes drumming accessible, exciting, and customizable for everyone.

Key Features:

🎵 Fully Animated First-Person View
Feel the beat like never before! Experience lifelike animations as your drummer’s arms and legs move in perfect sync with your every hit.

🛠️ Custom Pattern Builder
Unleash your creativity! Design, save, and perfect your own drum patterns to create beats that are uniquely yours.

✨ Drumming Assist Mode
New to drumming? No worries! Drumming Assist keeps you on beat, letting you start playing right away—no prior experience needed.

🎧 Play to Your Own Music
Jam to your favorite tracks! Upload custom soundtracks and tailor your drumming sessions to the music you love most.

👩‍🎤 AI Bandmates
Bring the stage to life! Play alongside AI bandmates who dynamically respond to the music, creating an authentic band experience.

🎉 AI Crowd Reactions
Feel the rush of a live performance! The cheering crowd reacts to your performance, making every session unforgettable.

From rocking out in a packed stadium to fine-tuning your skills in the garage, Drumming Sandbox is your first step toward discovering the joy of drumming. Whether you're aspiring to pick up real sticks or just looking for a fun way to explore music, this game puts the power of rhythm in your hands.

It’s your beat—own it.
